subject: Vam power supply
description_text: Does this come with UK 3pin plug?

conversations.body_text:
Yes.

Also, I'm awaiting delivery of pedals, tracking JSEEB2134716412YQ.

It says "Your package has arrived at a nearby pick-up point. Please pick it
up soon to avoid being returned. General explanation:

The carrier has collection deadline, we'd advise you pickup your package at
once, or it might be returned to the sender.If you ensure your package has
been delivered successfully, please ignore this notice"


I've not received the delivery and no note for how to collect?

They came today but having an issue. Pedals are visable in my game
controllers on windows but nothing being recognised in the simsonn software
or freejoy...

On Mon, 2 Jun 2025, 14:00 support, <support@simsonn.com> wrote:  
  Hello, could you please provide a photo of the pedal and a screenshot of the software? I’ll check it for you. Thank you!   
 
 ---- Replied Message ---- 
 

 From

 Date 
 06/02/2025 17:50 


  To
 
 support<support@simsonn.com> 


 Subject 
 Re: Vam power supply 

 
 
 They came today but having an issue. Pedals are visable in my game controllers on windows but nothing being recognised in the simsonn software or freejoy...  
  
 On Sun, 1 Jun 2025, 15:26 support, <support@simsonn.com> wrote: 
 
  We are currently on holiday and will resume work on June 3rd. Once we’re back, we will contact the shipping carrier to confirm the delivery details and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
    
 
 ---- Replied Message ---- 
 

 From 
 Callum<callum88@gmail.com> 


 Date 
 06/01/2025 21:46 


  To
 
 support<support@simsonn.com> 


 Subject 
 Re: Vam power supply 

 
 
 Yes.   
 Also, I'm awaiting delivery of pedals, tracking JSEEB2134716412YQ. 
   
 It says "Your package has arrived at a nearby pick-up point. Please pick it up soon to avoid being returned. General explanation:
 
 The carrier has collection deadline, we'd advise you pickup your package at once, or it might be returned to the sender.If you ensure your package has been delivered successfully, please ignore this notice" 
   
 I've not received the delivery and no note for how to collect?  
 
  
 On Sun, 1 Jun 2025, 13:33 support, <support@simsonn.com> wrote: 
 
  Hello, is it this type of connector?   
 
 ---- Replied Message ---- 
 

 From 
 Callum<callum88@gmail.com> 


 Date 
 06/01/2025 15:56 


  To
 
 support@simsonn.com<support@simsonn.com> 


 Subject 
 Vam power supply 

 
 
 Does this come with UK 3pin plug?

I got it working, thank you. There's 2 versions of the simsonn manager
software on your website which was a bit confusing.

Can you confirm if the Vam power unit comes with UK plug please?
Also, are you sending out any test/review units?

Thanks


Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Hi Callum,      You noted a UK power plug in your order, and we will include the appropriate plug as requested. The vibration test video will be released soon.

Hi, I've placed the order but forgot to note I need UK plug! Sorry.
Please can you amend on Order #SSN1662


Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
你好，Callum，  Sure, I’ve added a note to your order for a UK plug.

Thanks.

Does this post mean I will have the cost of my power adapter refunded?

Hi Callum,  We offer four types of plug specifications, and we've noted the UK plug for your order. Although the delivery of your VAM Pro has been delayed due to surface finishing on the housing, we truly believe it's worth the wait. We’re not aiming to profit from this product — it was developed primarily to support our pedal customers with a better upgrade experience.

Hi, thanks but that did not answer my question...
The reddit post says " As compensation, we will include the power adapter
of the corresponding country in every order. Sincere apologies!"
Does this mean the power adapter is now free with orders due to the delay?

As well as previous email, please can you advise why max force cannot be
set below 35kg?
Hi Callum,     We’ll get in touch with our software engineer when we’re back at work tomorrow. The default minimum value is 15kg.

Okay, thanks for the prompt responce. Are you able to advise on other query
relating to the power supply now being shipped for free please?

Hi Callum,    I'm sorry for the misinformation, reddit is maintained by our engineer, his English is not very professional. After confirmation, we have asked him to make a clarification on reddit, we are giving away the power adapter cable compatible with your country's standard plug type.
Okay thanks. Are they still getting sent today?

Hi,

Despite asking twice, you still sent a eu power plug not a UK one. I've had
to order one from amazon at my expense as I do not want to wait weeks
again.

How do you get the VAM working with Simhub?

Hi Callum,     Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now?  We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles.  In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that I’ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

Le mans ultimate.

Will you be sending UK plug? I'll return my amazon one in arrival.
Hi Callum,    How much did you pay for the UK plug you purchased on Amazon?
It was only £7. Is there plans for it to work with LMU?
Hi Callum,    Next week, our SIMSONN MANAGER will support LMU telemetry. For now, you can use LMU via SimHub. Please provide your PayPal account, and I will transfer £7 to you.
Okay great, thanks. PayPal is callum88@gmail.com
Hi Callum,    The payment has been made!
